pages.text: There are a number of items that you can make for your cats that will enrich their lives.

pages.title: Food Bowl
pages.text: This is where you provide your cat some nourishment.

pages.title: Cat Tree
pages.text: This is your cat's personal place to sleep.$(br2)Right-click with an empty hand to assign your cat to the bed. After you do this, if your cat uses up one of its lives, you can revive it here.

pages.title: Litterbox
pages.text: Give your cat a place to relieve itself.$(br2)If you have litterbox maintenance enabled, your cat will leave you a little something after it uses it.

pages.title: Litter Scoop
pages.text: If you have litterbox maintenance enabled, the scoop will clean a dirty box.

pages.title: Pet Door
pages.text: Add a pet door to your structure to give your pet access.$(br2)You can also lock/unlock it by right-clicking.
